item.title: About
item.description: このブログは。。。 Hugo makes use of a variety of open source projects including: https://github.com/russross/blackfriday https://github.com/alecthomas/chroma https://github.com/muesli/smartcrop https://github.com/spf13/cobra https://github.com/spf13/viper Hugo is ideal for blogs, corporate websites, creative portfolios, online magazines, single page applications or even a website with thousands of pages. Hugo is for people who want to hand code their own website without worrying about setting up complicated runtimes, dependencies and databases. Websites
